verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> I take <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in <S%H3467>you.<s%> Save me from all those who <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H5337>me,<s%> and deliver me,
lest they <S%H2963>tear<s%> apart my <S%H5315>soul<s%> like a <S%H738>lion,<s%> ripping it in <S%H6561>pieces,<s%> while there is none to <S%H5337>deliver.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> if I have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3426>this,<s%> if there is <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> in my <S%H3709>hands,<s%>

if I have <S%H1580>rewarded<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> to him who was at <S%H7999>peace<s%> with <S%H2502>me<s%> (yes, if I have delivered him who without <S%H7387>cause<s%> was my <S%H6887>adversary<s%>),

let the <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H7291>pursue<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H5381>overtake<s%> <S%H2416>it;<s%> yes, let him tread my life <S%H7429>down<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7931>lay<s%> my <S%H3519>glory<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> in your <S%H639>anger.<s%> Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> yourself against the <S%H5678>rage<s%> of my <S%H6887>adversaries.<s%> <S%H5782>Awake<s%> for <S%H6680>me.<s%> You have commanded <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
Let the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3816>peoples<s%> <S%H5437>surround<s%> <S%H7725>you.<s%> Rule over them on <S%H4791>high.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> administers <S%H1777>judgment<s%> to the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%> <S%H1777>Judge<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh, according to my <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and to my integrity that is in <S%H8537>me.<s%>

Oh let the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> come to an <S%H1584>end,<s%> but <S%H3559>establish<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> their <S%H3629>minds<s%> and <S%H3826>hearts<s%> are <S%H974>searched<s%> by the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>
My <S%H4043>shield<s%> is with <S%H430>God,<s%> who <S%H3467>saves<s%> the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H8199>judge,<s%> <S%H410>yes,<s%> a God who has <S%H2194>indignation<s%> every <S%H3117>day.<s%>
If a man <S%H7725>doesn't<s%> relent, he will <S%H3913>sharpen<s%> his <S%H2719>sword;<s%> he has <S%H1869>bent<s%> and <S%H3559>strung<s%> his <S%H7198>bow.<s%>
He has also <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for himself the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%> He <S%H6466>makes<s%> ready his <S%H1814>flaming<s%> <S%H2671>arrows.<s%>
<S%H2254>Behold,<s%> he travails with <S%H205>iniquity.<s%> <S%H2029>Yes,<s%> he has conceived <S%H5999>mischief,<s%> and brought <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H8267>falsehood.<s%>
He <S%H3738>has<s%> <S%H2658>dug<s%> a <S%H953>hole,<s%> and has <S%H5307>fallen<s%> into the <S%H7845>pit<s%> which he <S%H6466>made.<s%>
The <S%H5999>trouble<s%> he causes shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to his own <S%H7218>head.<s%> His <S%H2555>violence<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down<s%> on the crown of his own <S%H6936>head.<s%>

I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> according to his <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and will sing <S%H2167>praise<s%> to the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> Most <S%H5945>High.<s%>
